plot: When a father's long-secret financial mistakes come to light, he becomes depressed. The family slides into crisis and their stability disappears overnight. Against the background of the problematic property market in Split.
title: Tlo pod nogama
plot_es: When a father's long-secret financial mistakes come to light, he becomes depressed. The family slides into crisis and their stability disappears overnight. Against the background of the problematic property market in Split.
plot_en: When a father's long-secret financial mistakes come to light, he becomes depressed. The family slides into crisis and their stability disappears overnight. Against the background of the problematic property market in Split.
